text: Alexander Hegarth (1923–1984) was a German film and television actor.Görtz & Sarkowicz p.416 ==Selected filmography== ===Film=== * My Wife Makes Music (1958) * The Twins from Immenhof (1973) ===Television=== * Maximilian von Mexiko (1970) * The Buddenbrooks (1979) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Franz Josef Görtz & Hans Sarkowicz.
